products.title: Roma, Bahia - Vertical Blind
products.description: Both pretty and warm, the roma in bahia is a finely woven filter blind allows light to gently trickle through, whilst providing a blast of country colour wherever it's used. Deftly hanging louvres can be easily tilted and pulled across to open or close the blind, allowing you as much or as little light as you please. Place the bahia in a child's bedroom, where it will match fun wallpapers and furniture in bold primary colours; or create a fresh, vibrant colour scheme in the office, where white walls and medium woods will set it off perfectly.

products.title: Roma, Polar - Vertical Blind
products.description: Not quite mint, yet not quite aqua either, the roma in polar is a unique, icy green shade that will add a cool sophisticated to your home dcor. Soft but sturdy cotton-feel fabric gathers neatly into hanging louvres that can be opened and closed swiftly and neatly. Makeover a white bathroom by using it as the perfect canvas for the polar, supplementing it with silver fixtures and fittings; or create a gorgeous cool hue in the guest bedroom, where your visitors will love to wake up to this refreshing shade.

products.title: Roma, Fuscous Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slate grey and with a classically unadorned design, the sleek blind that is the roma in fuscous grey will bring contemporary cool wherever it's used. Its efficient filter function allows some soft light into the room, easing it in gently without disturbing you. The fuscous grey is miles ahead when it comes to modern style, and will work beautifully with equally trendy yellows and bright pinks, both perfect colour schemes for an up-to-date living room, bedroom, or dining room.

products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Vertical Blind
products.description: There are few hues more uplifting than a gentle, pretty aqua, and that's what roma in aqua haze brings to a room. Light, supple, and tightly woven fabric provides the base for this blind, and hangs beautifully in straight louvres to be opened or closed at your leisure. Awaken to a calm, ocean feel by hanging the aqua haze in your master bedroom, where you can surround it with whites and turquoises; or use in the most contemporary of living or dining rooms, complementing with light woods and soft off-whites.

products.title: Roma, Dawn - Vertical Blind
products.description: Simple and functional, the roma in dawn is ideal for creating privacy without compromising on light. The hardy but lightweight fabric is supple and durable, with a lovely cotton-like feel that emits quality and class in bucketloads. The dawn would look fantastic in the kitchen alongside blacks, whites, and greys for a classic monochrome look; in the dining room amongst bold blues for cool sophistication; or in the home office or bedroom alongside bold reds for a look of atmospheric functionality.

products.title: Roma, Alto - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in alto is a sleek, smooth blind, with a tightly woven fabric and natural beige hue. The strong yet lightweight material makes an effective light filter, allowing just the right amount to trickle through. Contrast against chocolate and mocha browns in the living room, highlighted by gold metallics, for a comfortable colour scheme to relax and unwind in. Or go a little bolder and use the alto to accent deep plum walls, with white and beige accents to complete the look.

products.title: Roma, Scorpion - Vertical Blind
products.description: What better way to bring contemporary style into your home than with the gorgeous, elegant roma scorpion? Hanging neatly in adjustable louvres that can be easily slid across or gently tilted, this blind offers quality fabric as well as chic and panache. The scorpion's cool neutrality works wonderfully as part of the uber-stylish colour scheme of yellow and grey, which can be fashionably complemented with fun chevron patterns and daring stripes.

products.title: Roma, Snuff - Vertical Blind
products.description: Combining light-filtering, easy-to-use functionality with a pretty, hushed purple hue, the roma snuff will make a gorgeous addition to any home. Its lovely mauve shade means that it can provide the perfect accent colour or take centre stage as the feature colour. Blend with deep aubergine purple for a bold, unapologetic look in the master bedroom, combining style and chic with romance and atmosphere; or have it sitting pretty in your downstairs hallway against soft cream walls and the palest of lilacs.

products.title: Roma, Lime - Vertical Blind
products.description: Put simply, the roma lime couldn't be livelier or more refreshing if it tried. Whilst it retains the smooth, tightly woven fabric so typical of the roma range, its bright green shade is much wilder, adding a vibrant colour pop wherever it's placed. Squirt some fruity fun into your kitchen by hanging the lime as a vibrant window feature, coupled with white and light wood accents. Or go for an all-out citrus colour scheme by combining this blind with white walls and orange and lemon accents.

products.title: Roma, Mischka - Vertical Blind
products.description: Light and soothing, the soft off-white of the roma in mischka adds peaceful ambience to any room. This matte, tightly woven blind is supple and easy to use, making it a practical choice as well as a pretty one. Add sanctuary to your home by using the mischka in a neutral colour scheme full of tans, taupes, and creams, gently accented by woods of all colours; this subtle, sophisticated look will work beautifully in a lounge, den, or dining room.

products.title: Roma, Thunderbird - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all in one. This strong, striking blind is here to make a statement, and a statement it will make. Help it along by placing against white or cream walls in your kitchen or dining room to really make it pop.

products.title: Roma, Grey Nickel - Vertical Blind
products.description: The cool and contemporary grey nickel, from the roma range of filter blinds, is an absolute must if you're going for sleek modern style in your home. Practical as well as smart, the blind's louvres hang deftly and can be pulled aside or tilted with ease. Offset the grey nickel with sunny yellows, fruity limes, or bright oranges to create a trendy and charming colour scheme. Use these striking colour combinations in a bright home office, a relaxing dining room, or a welcoming spare bedroom.

products.title: Roma, Monza - Vertical Blind
products.description: An effective filter blind, the roma monza gently filters light whilst avoiding dimming out the room completely. Red never goes out of style, being the go-to colour for bold and contemporary looks, so this blind will last through the years, regardless of trends. The strong, striking hue used in the monza will make the perfect window feature for an all-white dining room or grey and charcoal living room.

products.title: Roma, Athens Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In palest grey on a smoothly textured fabric, the athens grey from the roma collection offers a unique yet gentle hue that emits elegance and taste, the perfect look for a modern home. The athens grey lends itself to a coordinating charcoal and dove grey colour scheme, ideal for a home office; or to a palette of deep forest greens and pale greys in the den, complemented by medium, polished woods.

products.title: Roma, Bronco - Vertical Blind
products.description: For natural charm, choose the roma in bronco, a medium taupe fabric with a neat, tightly woven fabric, and excellent light-filtering properties, letting the light through at will, whether open or closed. Select the bronco for a strikingly neutral home office, where you can pair it with pale beiges and soft creams. Or instead, add a tempering shade to a dark brown living room, where you can snuggle up after a long night, and where cosiness and warmth are the words of the day.

products.title: Richmond, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The richmond cameo features a barely-there white base adorned with an array of lightly stitched, feathery curves in the same hue. Its louvres are easily adjustable for variable light and privacy, and hang neatly from their rails. Use the cameo in the bathroom, where privacy is key, and clean, fresh colours look their best. Add a soft aqua or duck egg to provide quick bursts of colour, using the hue for towels, bath mats, and wall art.

products.title: Roma, Rodeo Dust - Vertical Blind
products.description: A contemporary, beige filter blind, the roma in rodeo dust mixes a soft tan hue with a smooth, tightly woven fabric for a modern and streamlined look. Wherever you choose to place this blind, it will add a natural class to the room around it. Pair the rodeo dust with forest greens for an outdoorsy atmosphere in the living room, where this unusual and striking colour scheme will create an unforgettable aesthetic.

products.title: Roma, Natural - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of almost any colour scheme, being particularly suited to clean, fresh rooms full of soft pastels, such as pinks or blues - the perfect colour scheme for a nursery or child's bedroom. Or hang it in the living room amongst country greens and fresh, dainty florals, for a charmingly rustic feel with a contemporary twist.

products.title: Rochester, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The clean white of the cameo, from the arch-patterned rochester range, will work in almost any setting. The heavy curves of the patterning are streamlined and fresh, working wonderfully with the straight lines of the vertically hanging louvres. Use the cameo to add soft texture to an all-white kitchen, plumping for sleek, contemporary white units and glossy tiles. Include furniture in light to medium woods, or even modern whites, and choose silver for the fixtures, fittings, and oddments.

products.title: Rochester, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a sophisticated window dressing, opt for the elegant rochester in cream, where fine, silky threads shape a quality and beneficial blind with a captivating texture. This exquisite cloth, with both beauty and grace, hangs on adjustable louvres that allow you to alter the amount of light entering the room. Generate an elegant boudoir by including the dreamy texture of the cream amongst alike, opulent fabrics with similar shimmer and style.

products.title: Roma, Gallery - Vertical Blind
products.description: Calm and collected, the roma gallery's pale cream hue will set off bolder colours with ease, making it both a pretty and useful window feature. The pale colour shows off the supple, cotton-like fabric that is finely woven yet highly durable. Construct a serene, peaceful environment by using the gallery as the key colour rather than a complementary one, and place against matching cream walls and soft furnishings, with light woods working effectively as an accent; a look that will work beautifully in a master bedroom or living room.

products.title: Henderson, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The antique-style stripes of the henderson are this time in the soothing off-white of the cameo, with alternate stitching patterns forming the striping pattern, which complements the clean lines of the modern louvres. Choose the cameo as part of the nursery, where the sweet stripes will add interest to the room without complicating the decor. Match with a soft lemon yellow for a soothing palette to encourage calm and tranquility, whilst still giving off a happy and cheery vibe.
